full_text.full_text:
Characteristics of Logistic Regression (1/2)
1. A discriminative model that directly computes P(y = 1|x)
without making any assumption about the class conditional 
probabilities
– Hence, it is quite generic and can be applied in diverse application
2. The learned parameters w0, w1, w2, …, wn can be analyzed to 
understand the relationship between attributes and class labels
– Because there are different weights for every attribute
3. Logistic regression can handle irrelevant attributes
– By learning weight parameters close to 0 for irrelevant attributes
66

text.text:
1. A discriminative model that directly computes P(y = 1|x)
without making any assumption about the class conditional 
probabilities
– Hence, it is quite generic and can be applied in diverse application

2. The learned parameters w0, w1, w2, …, wn can be analyzed to 
understand the relationship between attributes and class labels
– Because there are different weights for every attribute
3. Logistic regression can handle irrelevant attributes
– By learning weight parameters close to 0 for irrelevant attributes
